categories: Category:Journey to Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker

nodes.text: First Order Villains is a canon young reader novel written by Michael Siglain and illustrated by Diogo Saito and Luigi Aimé. The story is set prior to the events of Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker, and includes stickers. The book was published on October 4, 2019 by Disney–Lucasfilm Press.
Meet the sinister Kylo Ren and the rest of the vile villains of the fearsome First Order from Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker.
